entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
